synopsis.text:
For senpai Naoto Hachiouji, life has taken an unexpected turn since his encounter with the enigmatic Hayase Nagatoro. As a junior who delights in teasing and tormenting him, Nagatoro has become a constant presence in the art club room and in Naoto's life. Despite her relentless antics, Naoto finds himself drawn to her infectious energy and gradually becomes more comfortable around her.

Although Nagatoro's teasing can be painful, Naoto begins to see glimpses of her hidden vulnerability and possessiveness. As they spend more time together, their bond deepens, and it becomes increasingly apparent to everyone around them that they harbor feelings for each other. However, both Naoto and Nagatoro struggle to express their true emotions, leaving their relationship in a delicate balance between friendship and something more.

As Naoto navigates the challenges of Nagatoro's sadistic tendencies and his own growing affection for her, he must find the courage to overcome his shyness and embrace the possibility of a deeper connection. Will Naoto and Nagatoro finally acknowledge their feelings and bridge the gap between them? Join them on this heartwarming and entertaining journey, as they discover the true nature of their relationship.
